About

My name is Adam Hawkins. I am web application developer who uses Ruby on Rails and touches of Javascript. I'm the lead developer for a finnish CRM startup right now and post rails tips and tricks here. You can follow me on twitter @Adman65. You can see my code on Github or contact me on LinkedIn. You can also catch me on freenode as Adman65 in #rubyonrails or #railsbridge.
